description: Protocols for everyone, by Ben Miles

protocols.name: SpreadNPick
protocols.description: Generates a run to spread a volume of bacteria, then pick colonies after incubation. Accepts 6 bacteria samples maximum, and max number of colonies picked per sample is 8.

media.description: Growth media for the liquid culture

solid_culture_plate.description: Choose the container to plate the bacteria into

sample_volume.description: Volume of bacteria to plate, recommended 1-5 µL.

media_volume.description: Recommended 1500µL of media, sample + media + antibiotic cannot exceed 2000µL

antibiotic.description: Optional antibiotic supplement, only one antibiotic can be specified.

antibiotic_volume.description: Volume of antibiotic, media and sample must not exceed 2000µL

carbon_source.description: Optional carbon source supplement, when using minimal media.

carbon_source_volume.description: Volume of carbon source solution, media and sample must not exceed 2000µL

plate_growth_time.description: Length of time the plated bacteria should grow

liq_growth_time.description: Length of time the picked colonies should grow for in liquid culture

minimum_picked_colonies.description: Minimum number of colonies that should be picked from the solid culture. Must be less than 8.
